name: Pugilist

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The pugilist attacks three times with their fists.

actions.name: Fists
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Opportune Jab
reactions.desc: If a creature attempts to grapple the pugilist, the pugilist attacks that creature with their fists.

reactions.name: Pugilists include skilled boxers
reactions.desc: They sometimes work as bodyguards or gangsters, though theyre most often found in the ring, challenging all comers.

reactions.name: Haymaker (1/Day)
reactions.desc: The pugilist attacks with their fists. On a hit, the attack deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage.

reactions.name: Head Shot (1/Day)
reactions.desc: The pugilist attacks with their fists. On a hit, the target makes a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is stunned until the end of the pugilists next turn.

special_abilities.name: Unarmored Defense
special_abilities.desc: The pugilists AC equals 10 + their Dexterity modifier + their Wisdom modifier.
